snippet: The long-running case against Sergey Aleynikov, a former Goldman Sachs programmer, is set to begin on Monday after a judge rebuffed a request from the prosecution for a long delay.
abstract: Manhattan prosecutor Daniel Holmes asks to delay trial of former Goldman Sachs programmer Sergey Aleynikov only to be rebuffed by Justice Daniel P Conviser; it is inauspicious beginning to latest chapter in on-again, off-again case against Aleynikov, who is accused of industrial secrets from Goldman.
lead_paragraph: The long-running case against Sergey Aleynikov, a former Goldman Sachs programmer, is set to begin on Monday after a judge rebuffed a request from the prosecution for a long delay.

headline.main: New Stumble in Trial of Former Goldman Programmer
headline.print_headline: New Stumble in Trial of Former Goldman Programmer
